amendment.description: Amendment exempts from compensation standards any institutions that receive TARP funding or payment agreements entered into before the enactment of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 111-71 to exempt from compensation standards any institutions that receive TARP funding or payment agreements entered into before the enactment of this bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meeks (NY) amendment Failed by voice vote.
